00047 AccessGroup::AccessGroup(const TableIdentifier *identifier,
00048     SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, Schema::AccessGroup *ag, const RangeSpec *range)
00049   : m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr), m_name(ag->name),
00050     m_next_table_id(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_blocksize(DEFAULT_BLOCKSIZE),
00051     m_compression_ratio(1.0), m_is_root(false), m_compaction_revision(0),
00052     m_earliest_cached_revision(TIMESTAMP_NULL),
00053     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved(TIMESTAMP_NULL),
00054     m_collisions(0), m_needs_compaction(false), m_drop(false),
00055     m_scanners_blocked(false) {
00056   m_table_name = m_identifier.name;
00057   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00058   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00059   m_range_name = m_table_name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00060   m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00061 
00062   foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns)
00063     m_column_families.insert(cf->id);
00064 
00065   if (ag->blocksize != 0)
00066     m_blocksize = ag->blocksize;
00067 
00068   m_compressor = (ag->compressor != "") ? ag->compressor
00069                                         : schema_ptr->get_compressor();
00070 
00071   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00072                && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00073 
00074   m_in_memory = ag->in_memory;
00075 }

00078 AccessGroup::~AccessGroup() {
00079   if (m_drop) {
00080     if (m_identifier.id == 0) {
00081       HT_ERROR("~AccessGroup has drop bit set, but table is METADATA");
00082       return;
00083     }
00084     String metadata_key = format("%u:%s", m_identifier.id, m_end_row.c_str());
00085     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00086     KeySpec key;
00087 
00088     try {
00089 
00090       mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00091 
00092       key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
00093       key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
00094       key.column_family = "Files";
00095       key.column_qualifier = m_name.c_str();
00096       key.column_qualifier_len = m_name.length();
00097       mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)"!", 1);
00098       mutator_ptr->flush();
00099     }
00100     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00101       // TODO: propagate exception
00102       HT_ERRORF("Problem updating 'File' column of METADATA (%s) - %s",
00103                 metadata_key.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00104     }
00105   }
00106   return;
00107 }
00108 
00114 int AccessGroup::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00115   if (key.revision > m_compaction_revision || m_in_memory) {
00116     if (m_earliest_cached_revision == TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00117       m_earliest_cached_revision = key.revision;
00118     return m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key, value);
00119   }
00120   return Error::OK;
00121 }

00123 
00124 CellListScanner *AccessGroup::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_context_ptr) {
00125   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00126   MergeScanner *scanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr);
00127   String filename;
00128 
00129   while (m_scanners_blocked)
00130     m_scanner_blocked_cond.wait(lock);
00131 
00132   scanner->add_scanner(m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr));
00133   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00134     scanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(
00135                          scan_context_ptr));
00136   if (!m_in_memory) {
00137     CellStoreReleaseCallback callback(this);
00138     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00139       scanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr));
00140       filename = m_stores[i]->get_filename();
00141       callback.add_file(filename);
00142       increment_file_refcount(filename);
00143     }
00144     scanner->install_release_callback(callback);
00145   }
00146   return scanner;
00147 }

00149 bool AccessGroup::include_in_scan(ScanContextPtr &scan_context_ptr) {
00150   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00151   for (std::set<uint8_t>::iterator iter = m_column_families.begin();
00152        iter != m_column_families.end(); ++iter) {
00153     if (scan_context_ptr->family_mask[*iter])
00154       return true;
00155   }
00156   return false;
00157 }

00159 const char *AccessGroup::get_split_row() {
00160   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00161   get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00162   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00163     sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00164     return (split_rows[split_rows.size()/2]).c_str();
00165   }
00166   return "";
00167 }

00169 void
00170 AccessGroup::get_split_rows(std::vector<String> &split_rows,
00171                             bool include_cache) {
00172   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00173   const char *row;
00174   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00175     row = m_stores[i]->get_split_row();
00176     if (row)
00177       split_rows.push_back(row);
00178   }
00179   if (include_cache)
00180     m_cell_cache_ptr->get_split_rows(split_rows);
00181 }

00183 void AccessGroup::get_cached_rows(std::vector<String> &rows) {
00184   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00185   m_cell_cache_ptr->get_rows(rows);
00186 }
00187 
00188 uint64_t AccessGroup::disk_usage() {
00189   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00190   uint64_t du = (m_in_memory) ? 0 : m_disk_usage;
00191   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00192   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00193     mu += m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00194   return du + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)mu);
00195 }
00196 
00197 uint64_t AccessGroup::memory_usage() {
00198   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00199   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00200   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00201     mu += m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00202   return mu;
00203 }

00205 void
00206 AccessGroup::get_compaction_priority_data(
00207     CompactionPriorityData &priority_data) {
00208   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00209   priority_data.ag = this;
00210 
00211   if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00212     priority_data.earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00213   else
00214     priority_data.earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00215 
00216   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00217   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00218     mu += m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used();
00219   priority_data.mem_used = mu;
00220   priority_data.disk_used = m_disk_usage + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio
00221                                                       * (float)mu);
00222   priority_data.in_memory = m_in_memory;
00223   priority_data.deletes = m_cell_cache_ptr->get_delete_count();
00224   if (m_immutable_cache_ptr)
00225     priority_data.deletes += m_immutable_cache_ptr->get_delete_count();
00226 }

00228 
00229 void AccessGroup::add_cell_store(CellStorePtr &cellstore_ptr, uint32_t id) {
00230   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00231 
00232   // Figure out the "next" CellStore number
00233   if (id >= m_next_table_id)
00234     m_next_table_id = id+1;
00235   else if (m_in_memory)
00236     return;
00237 
00238   m_disk_usage += cellstore_ptr->disk_usage();
00239   m_compression_ratio = cellstore_ptr->compression_ratio();
00240 
00241   // Record the most recent compaction revision
00242   if (m_compaction_revision == 0)
00243     m_compaction_revision = cellstore_ptr->get_revision();
00244   else {
00245     int64_t revision = cellstore_ptr->get_revision();
00246     if (revision > m_compaction_revision)
00247       m_compaction_revision = revision;
00248   }
00249 
00250   if (m_in_memory) {
00251     ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00252     CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr =
00253         cellstore_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00254     ByteString key, value;
00255     Key key_comps;
00256     m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00257     while (scanner_ptr->get(key_comps, value)) {
00258       m_cell_cache_ptr->add(key_comps, value);
00259       scanner_ptr->forward();
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263   m_stores.push_back(cellstore_ptr);
00264 
00265 }
00266 
00267 namespace {
00268   struct LtCellStore {
00269     bool operator()(const CellStorePtr &x, const CellStorePtr &y) const {
00270       return !(x->disk_usage() < y->disk_usage());
00271     }
00272   };
00273 }

00276 void AccessGroup::run_compaction(bool major) {
00277   ByteString bskey;
00278   ByteString value;
00279   Key key;
00280   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00281   size_t tableidx = 1;
00282   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00283   String metadata_key_str;
00284 
00285   try {
00286 
00287     if (!major && !m_needs_compaction)
00288       HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00289 
00290     HT_ASSERT(m_immutable_cache_ptr);
00291 
00292     m_needs_compaction = false;
00293 
00294     {
00295       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00296       if (m_in_memory) {
00297         if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0) {
00298           m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00299           HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00300         }
00301         tableidx = m_stores.size();
00302         HT_INFOF("Starting InMemory Compaction of %s(%s)",
00303                  m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00304       }
00305       else if (major) {
00306         if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0
00307             && m_stores.size() <= (size_t)1) {
00308           m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00309           HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00310         }
00311         tableidx = 0;
00312         HT_INFOF("Starting Major Compaction of %s(%s)",
00313                  m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00314       }
00315       else {
00316         if (m_stores.size() > (size_t)Global::access_group_max_files) {
00317           LtCellStore ascending;
00318           sort(m_stores.begin(), m_stores.end(), ascending);
00319           tableidx = m_stores.size() - Global::access_group_merge_files;
00320           HT_INFOF("Starting Merging Compaction of %s(%s)",
00321                    m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00322         }
00323         else {
00324           if (m_immutable_cache_ptr->memory_used() == 0) {
00325             m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00326             HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00327           }
00328           tableidx = m_stores.size();
00329           HT_INFOF("Starting Minor Compaction of %s(%s)",
00330                    m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00331         }
00332       }
00333     }
00334 
00335   }
00336   catch (Exception &e) {
00337     if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00338       m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00339     return;
00340   }
00341 
00342   try {
00343 
00344     // TODO: Issue 11
00345     char hash_str[33];
00346 
00347     if (m_end_row == "")
00348       memset(hash_str, '0', 24);
00349     else
00350       md5_string(m_end_row.c_str(), hash_str);
00351 
00352     hash_str[24] = 0;
00353     String cs_file = format("/hypertable/tables/%s/%s/%s/cs%d",
00354                             m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str(), hash_str,
00355                             m_next_table_id++);
00356 
00357     cellstore = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00358 
00359     if (cellstore->create(cs_file.c_str(), m_blocksize, m_compressor) != 0)
00360       HT_THROWF(Error::UNPOSSIBLE, "Problem compacting locality group to file "
00361                 "'%s'", cs_file.c_str());
00362 
00363     {
00364       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00365       ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00366 
00367       if (m_in_memory) {
00368         MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr, false);
00369         mscanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(
00370                               scan_context_ptr));
00371         scanner_ptr = mscanner;
00372       }
00373       else if (major || tableidx < m_stores.size()) {
00374         MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context_ptr, !major);
00375         mscanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(
00376                               scan_context_ptr));
00377         for (size_t i=tableidx; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00378           mscanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr));
00379         scanner_ptr = mscanner;
00380       }
00381       else
00382         scanner_ptr = m_immutable_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00383     }
00384 
00385     while (scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00386       cellstore->add(key, value);
00387       scanner_ptr->forward();
00388     }
00389 
00390     if (cellstore->finalize() != 0)
00391       HT_THROWF(Error::UNPOSSIBLE, "Problem finalizing CellStore '%s'",
00392                 cs_file.c_str());
00393 
00397     {
00398       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00399 
00400       if (m_in_memory) {
00401         merge_caches();
00402         m_stores.clear();
00403         m_live_files.clear();
00404       }
00405       else {
00406 
00407         m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00408 
00410         if (tableidx < m_stores.size()) {
00411           m_stores.resize(tableidx);
00412           m_live_files.clear();
00413           for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00414             m_live_files.insert(m_stores[i]->get_filename());
00415         }
00416       }
00417 
00421       if (cellstore->get_total_entries() > 0) {
00422         m_stores.push_back(cellstore);
00423         m_live_files.insert(cellstore->get_filename());
00424       }
00425       else {
00426         String fname = cellstore->get_filename();
00427         cellstore = 0;
00428         Global::dfs->remove(fname);
00429       }
00430 
00432       m_gc_locked_files.clear();
00433       foreach(const FileRefCountMap::value_type &v, m_file_refcounts)
00434         if (m_live_files.count(v.first) == 0)
00435           m_gc_locked_files.insert(v.first);
00436 
00438       m_disk_usage = 0;
00439       m_compression_ratio = 0.0;
00440       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00441         double disk_usage = m_stores[i]->disk_usage();
00442         m_disk_usage += (uint64_t)disk_usage;
00443         m_compression_ratio += m_stores[i]->compression_ratio() * disk_usage;
00444       }
00445       m_compression_ratio /= m_disk_usage;
00446 
00447       if (cellstore)
00448         m_compaction_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00449 
00450       m_scanners_blocked = true;
00451     }
00452 
00453     update_files_column();
00454 
00458     m_scanners_blocked = false;
00459     m_scanner_blocked_cond.notify_all();
00460 
00461     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00462 
00463     HT_INFOF("Finished Compaction of %s(%s)", m_range_name.c_str(),
00464              m_name.c_str());
00465 
00466   }
00467   catch (Exception &e) {
00468     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00469     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00470     merge_caches();
00471     if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00472       m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00473     if (m_scanners_blocked) {
00474       m_scanners_blocked = false;
00475       m_scanner_blocked_cond.notify_all();
00476     }
00477   }
00478 
00479 }

00486 int AccessGroup::shrink(String &new_start_row) {
00487   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00488   int error;
00489   CellCachePtr old_cell_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr;
00490   CellCachePtr new_cell_cache_ptr;
00491   ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00492   CellListScannerPtr cell_cache_scanner_ptr;
00493   ByteString key;
00494   ByteString value;
00495   Key key_comps;
00496   std::vector<CellStorePtr> new_stores;
00497   CellStore *new_cell_store;
00498   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00499   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00500 
00501   m_start_row = new_start_row;
00502   m_range_name = m_table_name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00503 
00504   new_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00505   new_cell_cache_ptr->lock();
00506 
00507   m_cell_cache_ptr = new_cell_cache_ptr;
00508 
00509   cell_cache_scanner_ptr = old_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00510 
00514   while (cell_cache_scanner_ptr->get(key_comps, value)) {
00515     if (strcmp(key_comps.row, m_start_row.c_str()) > 0) {
00516       add(key_comps, value);
00517       memory_added += key.length() + value.length();
00518       items_added++;
00519     }
00520     cell_cache_scanner_ptr->forward();
00521   }
00522 
00523   new_cell_cache_ptr->unlock();
00524 
00528   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00529     String filename = m_stores[i]->get_filename();
00530     new_cell_store = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00531     if ((error = new_cell_store->open(filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(),
00532         m_end_row.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00533       HT_ERRORF("Problem opening cell store '%s' [%s:%s] - %s",
00534                 filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str(),
00535                 Error::get_text(error));
00536       return error;
00537     }
00538     if ((error = new_cell_store->load_index()) != Error::OK) {
00539       HT_ERRORF("Problem loading index of cell store '%s' [%s:%s] - %s",
00540                 filename.c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str(),
00541                 Error::get_text(error));
00542       return error;
00543     }
00544     new_stores.push_back(new_cell_store);
00545   }
00546 
00547   m_stores = new_stores;
00548 
00549   return Error::OK;
00550 }

00556 void AccessGroup::get_files(String &text) {
00557   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00558   text = "";
00559   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00560     text += m_stores[i]->get_filename() + ";\n";
00561 }
00562 
00563 
00566 void AccessGroup::release_files(const std::vector<String> &files) {
00567   bool need_files_update = false;
00568 
00569   {
00570     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00571     for (size_t i=0; i<files.size(); i++) {
00572       if (decrement_file_refcount(files[i])) {
00573         if (m_gc_locked_files.count(files[i]) > 0) {
00574           m_gc_locked_files.erase(files[i]);
00575           need_files_update = true;
00576         }
00577       }
00578     }
00579   }
00580 
00581   if (need_files_update)
00582     update_files_column();
00583 }
00584 
00587 void AccessGroup::update_files_column() {
00588   String files;
00589 
00590   {
00591     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00592 
00596     files = "";
00597     // get the "live" ones
00598     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00599       files += m_stores[i]->get_filename() + ";\n";
00600     // get the "locked" ones (prevents gc)
00601     foreach(const String &f, m_gc_locked_files)
00602       files += format("#%s;\n", f.c_str());
00603   }
00604 
00605   try {
00606     if (m_is_root) {
00607       MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema_ptr);
00608       metadata.write_files(m_name, files);
00609     }
00610     else {
00611       MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00612       metadata.write_files(m_name, files);
00613     }
00614   }
00615   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00616     // TODO: propagate exception
00617     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Problem updating 'Files' column of METADATA: "
00618                  << e << HT_END;
00619   }
00620 }
00621 
00622 
00626 void AccessGroup::increment_file_refcount(const String &filename) {
00627   FileRefCountMap::iterator iter = m_file_refcounts.find(filename);
00628 
00629   if (iter == m_file_refcounts.end())
00630     m_file_refcounts[filename] = 1;
00631   else
00632     (*iter).second++;
00633 }
00634 
00635 
00639 bool AccessGroup::decrement_file_refcount(const String &filename) {
00640   FileRefCountMap::iterator iter = m_file_refcounts.find(filename);
00641 
00642   HT_ASSERT(iter != m_file_refcounts.end());
00643 
00644   if (--(*iter).second == 0) {
00645     m_file_refcounts.erase(iter);
00646     return true;
00647   }
00648 
00649   return false;
00650 }
00651 
00652 
00653 void AccessGroup::initiate_compaction() {
00654   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00655   HT_ASSERT(!m_immutable_cache_ptr);
00656   m_immutable_cache_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr;
00657   m_immutable_cache_ptr->freeze();
00658   m_cell_cache_ptr = new CellCache();
00659   m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00660   m_earliest_cached_revision = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00661 }
00662 
00663 
00664 
00665 void AccessGroup::merge_caches() {
00666   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00667   Key key;
00668   ByteString value;
00669 
00670   m_immutable_cache_ptr->unfreeze();
00671   if (m_cell_cache_ptr->size() > 0) {
00672     ScanContextPtr scan_context_ptr = new ScanContext(m_schema_ptr);
00673     scanner_ptr = m_cell_cache_ptr->create_scanner(scan_context_ptr);
00674     while (scanner_ptr->get(key, value)) {
00675       m_immutable_cache_ptr->add(key, value);
00676       scanner_ptr->forward();
00677     }
00678   }
00679   m_cell_cache_ptr = m_immutable_cache_ptr;
00680   m_immutable_cache_ptr = 0;
00681 }
